participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sports-oriented, with a passion for music and a laid-back attitude.
participant_1.background: I have one older sister. I'm currently looking for a job, preferably at a restaurant. My favourite artist is Travis Scott. I like playing basketball. My mother is a dentist.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and nurturing, excited about family life, and adapting to new environments.
participant_2.background: I work at a school. I am expecting triplets in three months. I just moved into my first home. I recently moved to this country. I already have stepchildren.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today? I just got back from playing basketball
what do you do for a living? I am a job at the restaurant
do you have any pets? I have a older sister. he is a cop
do you like travis scott? I do. he is my older sister. he loves it
what are your hobbies? I like basketball. I am looking for job
what is your favourite artist? I love travis scott. I like it
